AAa.caption: Record Forms
AAa.doc: Enable recordings of input value and interactions.
AAa.name: record_forms

AAb.caption: Record IPs
AAb.doc: Enable the recording of the IP address.
AAb.name: record_ips

AAc.caption: Record Emails
AAc.doc: Enable the recording of the email address within the page. Does not impact value inside an input form.
AAc.name: record_emails

AAd.caption: Record Numbers
AAd.doc: Enable the recording of the numbers within the page. Does not impact value inside an input form.
AAd.name: record_numbers

AAe.caption: Remember that you will most likely need to get visitor consent before enabling the recording of sensitive data.
AAe.name: consent

AAj.caption: Record Canvas
AAj.doc: Enable recording of all Canvas elements. The Higher quality require more bandwidth.
AAj.name: record_canvas
